trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Expõe tipos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> à Automação de Interface do Usuário.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de controle para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> representing the bounding rectangle of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> que representa o retângulo delimitador do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> that represents the screen coordinates of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> que representa as coordenadas da <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the word "Window".
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém a palavra "Window".

trans-unit.source: Gets the text label of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o rótulo de texto do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.Name" /> or <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" />, or <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> if the name is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que conterá o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.Name" /> ou o <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name" /> da <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> ou <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />, se o nome for <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The name property can be thought of as the string of text that a user would use to explain which control is being referred to.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de nome pode ser pensada como a cadeia de caracteres de texto que um usuário deseja usar para explicar o que controle se refere.

trans-unit.source: It is important to have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.
trans-unit.target: É importante ter uma representação textual para todos os controles de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] para que você pode consultar programaticamente o controle de maneira localizada.
